banner.title: TP WorkLife 10/12
banner.mainContentHeadline: The podcast where science meets business
banner.mainContent: From fixing meetings to finding a mentor, get new insights to help you enjoy your time at work and thrive in your career.

videoData.title: Facing the future together
videoData.presenterDisplayName: Rowan Fitzpatrick and Heart of Mind

nodes.whoTheyAre: Rowan Fitzpatrick is at the forefront of self-driven social learnings at Westpac, helping employees take charge of their personal and professional growth. He is passionate about helping curate and develop content that helps employees drive their own learning pathways in ways that best suit them. He is also trained in smooth jazz and often busts out his saxophone.

Heart of Mind is based in Sydney, Australia and has crafted from their sound from a wide range of rock influences. They jam with tasty guitar licks and solos, delivering a sweet performance on the TED@Westpac stage.

videoData.description: Rowan and his band, Heart of Mind, have developed a unique brand of "colour rock," crafted from a wide range of rock influences. Rowan jams with tasty guitar licks and solos, and is also trained in smooth jazz. He often busts out his saxophone in times of need and on the TED@Westpac stage delivers a sweet performance.
videoData.socialDescription: Rowan and his band, Heart of Mind, have developed a unique brand of "colour rock," crafted from a wide range of rock influences. Rowan jams with tasty guitar licks and solos, and is also trained in smooth jazz. He often busts out his saxophone in times of need and on the TED@Westpac stage delivers a sweet performance.
